params._name: domain name to add the emoji reaction

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._price: price for the emoji reaction addition

params._name: domain name to trasnfer the emoji reactions
params._receiver: address to receive the emoji reactions

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

withdraw().details: Only owner of the revenue account can withdraw funds

emojiReactionCounters.details: DC TokenId -> Owner -> EmojiType -> Emoji reaction counter

getEmojiReactions(string).notice: Returns all the emoji reactions added to the specific domain

setEmojiReactionPrice(uint8,uint256).notice: Set the price of each emoji reaction

transferEmojiReactions(string,address).notice: Transfer the emoji reactions to another address
